channel.title: Setting mySQL with servers? (Real help only!)
channel.description:
Yes.. I have a source with mysql enabled.. And How would I set up mysql?
Real help only! please
I've heard you needed xampp.. and I have that downloaded.. What else do I need?

@Zombiedevice wrote:

While we are on this subject…

Does any one have a working link to a high scores on your website? I mean most of the tutorials have it, but the download links for the files are usually always broken.
